title: Stop the Presses
content:
Baldur's Mouth Gazette printing slander. Print a puff piece in the next broadsheet. Check the next edition of the Baldur's Mouth Gazette.

Stop the Presses Walkthrough

Speak to Estra Stir (south of the Basilisk Gate in the Lower City), you learn that the party is the subject of the Baldur's Mouth Gazette's next issue - the juiciest one to date.
